a.style: font-family:"Playfair Display", Georgia, "Times New Roman", serif

text.tspan: Share of GDP spent on education vs. Share of expenditure assigned to
Government expenditure on education as a share of GDP (X-axis), against government expenditure on education as a share
Colors represent different world regions. Observations correspond to 2016 data (or the year before/after if 2016 missing).
Government expenditure on education as share of GDP in 2016
Expenditure on education as share of government expenditure
Source: World Bank, Population (Gapminder, HYDE(2016) & UN (2019))
